subtitle: A warming hot soup made from sun-ripened tomatoes, basil and orange.

method.text: Halve tomatoes and squeeze them to remove the seeds. Put tomatoes, onion and carrot in a saucepan with the lemon rind, bay leaf and basil. Season. Add stock and simmer, covered, for about 30 min. Liquidise, cool and set aside.
Clean the pan. Melt the butter, add the flour and cook for a few minutes. Remove from heat, then gradually add the liquidised mixture. Bring to boil.
Peel the orange. Finely shred the rind, blanch, and then refresh in cold water. Squeeze orange and add juice to  soup. Check seasoning and serve in warm bowls.

title: Tomato and orange soup with basil
